item.title: Working with ESS data in R
item.description: I came across a good step by step guide for using European Social Survey in R. I had some issues with the code, and in the end I found that tidyverse has some nice alternatives to the code preseneted, like the stuff on weighting, but in general this was a really interesting post. I want to walk through some of my workflow here. We can start by loading some of the ESS data for the Russian Federation.
